articles.author: Laura M. MacLatchy, Dan Peppe, Kieran McNulty
articles.title: Wooded grasslands flourished in Africa 21 million years ago—new research forces a rethink of ape evolution - Phys.org
articles.description: Human evolution is tightly connected to the environment and landscape of Africa, where our ancestors first emerged.
articles.content:
Human evolution is tightly connected to the environment and landscape of Africa, where our ancestors first emerged.
According to the traditional scientific narrative, Africa was once a verdant idyll… [+9210 chars]
